content: i love handspun yarn combined with squishy simple textures i really enjoyed watching the colours shift while knitting this lovely oversized wrap a perfect cozy fall project i ve included non-handspun yarn suggestions and colour management on page 5 of the pattern yarn for this shawl i spun one 300g pack of hedgehog fibres lucky dip fibre in pastels 1 i ended up using 280g of finished yarn which comes to approx 745m 266m/100g alternatively 4 skeins of hedgehog fibres sock yarn or skinny singles in a choice of 4 colours fingering weight yarn that will be held double 1 https //shop hedgehogfibres com/collections/fibre
